__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Foraging

pages.name: Wild Crops
pages.text: One of your first food sources will be $(thing)wild crops$(). These will give you $(thing)food$() and $(thing)seeds$().

In shallow water $(thing)cattails$() can be broken with a knife to get $(thing)cattail roots$(). They are a great early source of grain. Also, underwater plants that aren't grass can be broken with a knife to get $(thing)seaweed$().

Rivers and seas are teeming with aquatic life. All small $(thing)fish$() are edible, but you might not want to eat a pufferfish! Of course, the world is also full of $(thing)domestic animals$() that you can tame or kill for food. Predators like $(thing)bears$() don't drop any useful meat.
